struct ThreadInfo {
    int start, end, result;
};
void *sum_thread(void *argument) {
    struct ThreadInfo *<span data-fragment-index="3" class="fragment custom myem-only">my_info</span> = Q\\tikzmark{info}Q (struct ThreadInfo *) argument;
    int sum = 0;
    for (int i = my_info-&gt;start; i &lt; my_info-&gt;end; ++i) { sum += values\[i]; }
    <span data-fragment-index="4" class="fragment custom myem-only">my_info-&gt;result = sum;</span>
    return NULL;
}
int sum_all() {
    pthread_t thread\[2]; <span data-fragment-index="3" class="fragment custom myem-only">struct ThreadInfo info[2];</span>
    for (int i = 0; i &lt; 2; ++i) {
        info\[i].start = i*512; info\[i].end = (i+1)*512;
        pthread_create(&amp;threads\[i], NULL, sum_thread, &amp;info\[i]);
    }
    for (int i = 0; i &lt; 2; ++i) { pthread_join(threads\[i], NULL); }
    return info\[0].result + info\[1].result;
}
